ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 27
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Good point.  Mana monsters have resistances to ice, fire, lightning, ... just like you do.  If you notice that your first Shock of Lightning only does 10
ygData.messageBody:
> I think for every level of spells, the bolts spell do 10
> more damage then
> the shock spells.
> I think it is handy to have both (havnt bought any bolts
> yes) because they
> tend to differ
> in base.
>
> ie) Shock of Ice and Fire Bolt.

Good point. Mana monsters have resistances to ice, fire, lightning,
... just like you do. If you notice that your first Shock of
Lightning only does 10 damage, try casting a Fire spell on it and see
if that gets through. Never hurts to experiment.

Unrelated: in our catgeory of "Incredibly Useful Spells Everyone
Should Get": Halo of Lightning. Gives you a yellow headband which is
not only AC 3, but gives more light than a greater lightstone.

Aznyin
Level 12 Erudite Wizard
Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
